O

orderId() - Method in record class model.Bills
Returns the value of the orderId record component.
Orders - Class in model
Orders is a mask of database table orders

OrdersBLL - Class in bll
OrdersBLL Class represents the order logic, using OrdersDAO

OrdersDAO - Class in dao

OrdersInterface - Class in presentation
User Interface to manage Orders, which is controlled by presentation.Control
